reference.title: toascii : force integers to ASCII range

section.title: Description
section.p: toascii is a macro which coerces integers to the ASCII range (0--127) by zeroing any higher-order bits.
You can use a compiled subroutine instead of the macro definition by undefining this macro using `#undef toascii'.

section.title: Returns
section.p:
toascii returns integers between 0 and 127.
tolower : translate characters to lower case
